hadiths.text: Narrated ‘Abdallah bin Shaddad bin Al Had :We entered upon A’ishah, wife of the Prophet (ﷺ). She said The Apostle of Allaah (ﷺ) entered upon me and saw two silver rings in my hand. He asked What is this, Aishah? I said I have made two ornaments myself for you, Messenger of Allah (ﷺ). He asked Do you pay zakat on them? I said No or I said Whatever Allah willed. He said this is sufficient for you (to take you) to the Hell fire

chapter.ara-name: باب الْكَنْزِ مَا هُوَ وَزَكَاةِ الْحُلِيِّ
chapter.eng-name: On The Meaning Of Kanz (Treasure) And Zakat On Jewellery
